## (Q3)
```{r}
num_outliers <- function(x) {
  x <- x[!is.na(x)]
  q25 <- quantile(x, 0.25)
  q75 <- quantile(x, 0.75)
  IQR_val <- q75 - q25
  lower_bound <- q25 - 1.5 * IQR_val
  upper_bound <- q75 + 1.5 * IQR_val
  num_outliers <- sum(x < lower_bound | x > upper_bound)
  return(num_outliers)
}
test_vector <- c(0, 40, 60, 185)
num_outliers(test_vector)
num_outliers(c(0, 40, 60, 185))
```

X_tilde <- 2.4 * Hawks$Weight + 7.1
Y_tilde <- -1 * Hawks$Wing + 3

Y_tilde <- Y_tilde[valid_indices]

Wing <- Hawks$Wing[valid_indices]

  Covariance_Original = cov_original,
  Covariance_Transformed = cov_transformed,
  Correlation_Original = cor_original,

## (Q4)
```{r}
Gen_X_numbers <- function(n) {
  X_vals <- numeric(n)
  for (i in 1:n) {
    u <- runif(1)
    if (u < 0.5) {
      X_vals[i] <- 0
    } else if (u < 0.7) {
      X_vals[i] <- 3
    } else {
      X_vals[i] <- 10
    }
  }
  return(X_vals)
}
Gen_X_numbers(4)
Gen_Y_samples <- function(m, n) {
  Y_vals <- map_dbl(1:m, ~ sum(Gen_X_numbers(n)))
  df_Y <- data.frame(index = 1:m, Y = Y_vals)
  return(df_Y)
}
Gen_Y_samples(5, 2)
n <- 3
m <- 50000
Y_samples <- Gen_Y_samples(m, n)
ggplot(Y_samples, aes(x = Y)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count", width = 0.7, fill = "skyblue") + xlab("Y values (sum of X1, X2, X3)") + ylab("Frequency") + ggtitle("Bar Plot of 50000 Samples of Y = X1 + X2 + X3") + theme_minimal()
n <- 20
Y_samples_n20 <- Gen_Y_samples(m, n)
ggplot(Y_samples_n20, aes(x = Y)) + geom_bar(stat = "count", width = 0.7, fill = "lightcoral") + xlab("Y values (sum of X1 to X20)") + ylab("Frequency") + ggtitle("Bar Plot of 50000 Samples of Y = X1 + ... + X20") + theme_minimal()

alpha <- 0.3
beta <- 0.4
simulate_X <- function(n, alpha, beta) {
  U <- runif(n)
  X <- numeric(n)
  X[U < (1 - alpha - beta)] <- 0
  X[U >= (1 - alpha - beta) & U < (1 - beta)] <- 3
  X[U >= (1 - beta)] <- 10
  
  return(X)
}
set.seed(123)
n <- 1000
X_sample <- simulate_X(n, alpha, beta)
table(X_sample) / n
```

## (Q3)
```{r}
sample_X_0310 <- function(alpha, beta, n) {
  U <- runif(n)
  X <- case_when(
    (U >= 0) & (U < alpha) ~ 3,
    (U >= alpha) & (U < alpha + beta) ~ 10,
    (U >= alpha + beta) & (U <= 1) ~ 0
  )
  return(X)
}
set.seed(0)
sample_X <- sample_X_0310(alpha = 0.25, beta = 0.25, n = 1000)
head(sample_X)
```

```{r}
my_cdf_exp <- function(x, lambda) {
  if (x < 0) {
    return(0)
  } else {
    return(1 - exp(-lambda * x))
  }
}
lambda <- 1/2
library(purrr)
map_dbl(.x = seq(-1, 4), .f = ~my_cdf_exp(x = .x, lambda = lambda))
test_inputs <- seq(-1, 10, 0.1)
my_cdf_output <- map_dbl(.x = test_inputs, .f = ~my_cdf_exp(x = .x, lambda = lambda))
inbuilt_cdf_output <- map_dbl(.x = test_inputs, .f = ~pexp(q = .x, rate = lambda))
all.equal(my_cdf_output, inbuilt_cdf_output)
```
## (Q3)
```{r}
my_quantile_exp <- function(p, lambda) {
  if (p <= 0 || p >= 1) {
    stop("p 必须在 (0, 1) 区间内")
  }
  return(-log(1 - p) / lambda)
}
lambda <- 1/2
test_probs <- seq(0.01, 0.99, by = 0.01)
my_quantile_output <- map_dbl(.x = test_probs, .f = ~my_quantile_exp(p = .x, lambda = lambda))
inbuilt_quantile_output <- map_dbl(.x = test_probs, .f = ~qexp(p = .x, rate = lambda))
all.equal(my_quantile_output, inbuilt_quantile_output)
```
